Release Notes

No repository commits were dated February 25, 2026. This build includes the latest functional updates from February 24, 2026:

  • Added launch-at-login support with app startup state management improvements.
  • Added Linear OAuth flow and expanded Linear sync service integration.
  • Added settings-level integration toggles and sync UI refinements across dashboard and menu surfaces.
  • Improved task editing and shared model updates to support the new sync and startup behaviors.
